3: Time slows down in the twins' visions. With ease, they approach Asslam, leaping into the air and launching a deadly strike at the fractured carriages once more.
Bodies of flesh and blood fall off the train amidst desperate cries, like scattered paper in the wind.
Before despair can tear him apart, Watanabe charges into the crowd of Hetero-Creatures, his two blades drawn.
As the Red Tide threatens to devour everyone, the surviving humans and Constructs all take up arms, unable to stand aside.
How many more lives are you going to take?!
Tears and prayers, howls and vows.

Blood and the Red Tide intermingle along the train tracks, drawing a crimson scar across the earth. As thunder roars in the sky, the cacophony of the crowd's cries composes the symphony of the inferno.
Right now, they are still twelve hours away from arriving at City 210.
People still believe then that hope awaits them ahead.
